text: Following the cancellation of his tour, rumour has now spread that Justin Bieber may be planning to start up his own church. Last night saw Bieber cancel his world ‘ Purpose ’ tour, months before it was due to end – citing claiming to be ‘ burned out ’ and exhausted from the months on the road.
